snippet.title: Unbearable - Split screen survival horror. Gameplay Trailer (Early access).
snippet.description:
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1990060/Unbearable/

Claudia, a woman who has lost her job as a reporter, decides to go investigate the psychiatric hospital "Milagros" which keeps a story as secret as it is macabre. During this journey he meets people who have the same intentions and others who will get in the way.
With the help of her new companions, she must face the secrets of the psychiatric hospital, but the biggest fight is against her own mind.

Narrative Story: Delve into a dark and gritty story with mechanics inspired by survival horror games from the ps2 era.

Cooperative Campaign: Play the story alone or with a friend in split screen.

Transversality: Climb through the scenarios to reach objectives and solve puzzles.

Hide or Fight: Go unnoticed without alerting enemies or use the different melee and fire weapons to finish them off.

Inventory System: Collect items, manage your resources and combine them to solve puzzles.
